summary: Water quality parameters are stable but pH is slightly below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Consider increasing pH to optimal range (6.5-7.5) using calcium carbonate.
Monitor TDS levels; ensure they remain below 500 ppm for tilapia health.
Maintain temperature around 26-30°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.039 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 314.25 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.04 / 24.19 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
